request.title: Change to winter tires
request.description: One of the wheels came off and I'm not a handy person. You might need some wrench or something as well. Will tip quick fixer.

offers.message: Hi! I'd love to help you with your wheel-chair and I have the tools needed. Although I think 140p would be better. Deal? When can I come // Benedict
I can fix this for you in a minute
